headline: Northrop Secures a Contract for Supplying Precision Guidance Kits
summary: The U.S. Army has been using NOC's PGKs for a decade to upgrade conventional 155mm artillery to a near-precision level of accuracy.

raw.headline: Northrop Secures a Contract for Supplying Precision Guidance Kits
raw.summary: The U.S. Army has been using NOC's PGKs for a decade to upgrade conventional 155mm artillery to a near-precision level of accuracy.

headline: Lockheed Martin Secures a Contract to Support Submarines
summary: LMT secures a $54.2 million contract to manufacture submarine electronic warfare systems for newly constructed and in-service submarines.

raw.headline: Lockheed Martin Secures a Contract to Support Submarines
raw.summary: LMT secures a $54.2 million contract to manufacture submarine electronic warfare systems for newly constructed and in-service submarines.

headline: Northrop Grumman Announces Webcast, Conference Call of First Quarter 2025 Financial Results
summary: FALLS CHURCH, Va., March 20, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Northrop Grumman Corporation (NYSE: NOC) announced today that its first quarter 2025 financial results will be posted on its investor relations website on Tuesday, April 22, 2025. Prior to the market opening, the company will issue an advisory release notifying the public of the availability of the complete and full text earnings release on the company’s website at http://investor.northropgrumman.com.
